verses.name: Isaiah 62:1
verses.text: For Zion’s sake will I not hold my peace, and for Jerusalem’s sake I will not rest, until the righteousness thereof go forth as brightness, and the salvation thereof as a lamp that burneth.

verses.name: Isaiah 62:2
verses.text: And the Gentiles shall see thy righteousness, and all kings thy glory: and thou shalt be called by a new name, which the mouth of the Lord shall name.

verses.name: Isaiah 62:3
verses.text: Thou shalt also be a crown of glory in the hand of the Lord, and a royal diadem in the hand of thy God.

verses.name: Isaiah 62:4
verses.text: Thou shalt no more be termed Forsaken; neither shall thy land any more be termed Desolate: but thou shalt be called Hephzi–bah, and thy land Beulah: for the Lord delighteth in thee, and thy land shall be married.

verses.name: Isaiah 62:5
verses.text: For as a young man marrieth a virgin, so shall thy sons marry thee: and as the bridegroom rejoiceth over the bride, so shall thy God rejoice over thee.

verses.name: Isaiah 62:6
verses.text: I have set watchmen upon thy walls, O Jerusalem, which shall never hold their peace day nor night: ye that make mention of the Lord, keep not silence,

verses.name: Isaiah 62:7
verses.text: And give him no rest, till he establish, and till he make Jerusalem a praise in the earth.

verses.name: Isaiah 62:8
verses.text: The Lord hath sworn by his right hand, and by the arm of his strength, Surely I will no more give thy corn to be meat for thine enemies; and the sons of the stranger shall not drink thy wine, for the which thou hast laboured:

verses.name: Isaiah 62:9
verses.text: But they that have gathered it shall eat it, and praise the Lord; and they that have brought it together shall drink it in the courts of my holiness.

verses.name: Isaiah 62:10
verses.text: Go through, go through the gates; prepare ye the way of the people; cast up, cast up the highway; gather out the stones; lift up a standard for the people.

verses.name: Isaiah 62:11
verses.text: Behold, the Lord hath proclaimed unto the end of the world, Say ye to the daughter of Zion, Behold, thy salvation cometh; behold, his reward is with him, and his work before him.

verses.name: Isaiah 62:12
verses.text: And they shall call them, The holy people, The redeemed of the Lord: and thou shalt be called, Sought out, A city not forsaken.
